description: . There will be cascading events, actions and transitions that will naturally follow a single high-level event. This message is designed to encapsulate all of those.

FromName.title: From Name
FromName.description: The name (not the handle, so immutable) of the Node issuing the report. This will typically be the scada node itself.

TriggerId.title: TriggerId
TriggerId.description: Reference uuid for the triggering event that started the cascade of side-effect actions, events and transitions captured in this report

AtomicList.description: The list of cascading events, transitions and actions triggered by a single high-level event in a hierarchical finite state machine.

UuidCanonicalTextual.description: A string of hex words separated by hyphens of length 8-4-4-4-12.

SpaceheatName.description: Lowercase words separated by periods, where the word characters can be alphanumeric or a hyphen and the first word starts with an alphabet character.
